title: Monday Mini: Supply Chain Shortages and Women
itunes:title: Monday Mini: Supply Chain Shortages and Women
description:
Shortages of tampons and baby formula have shone a light on the ways supply chain issues are having a larger impact on women. We discuss why that is and why we aren't talking about it more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
